creditline: Bequest of Miss Tessie Jones in memory of Herschel V. Jones
description: Portrait of a man, John Baillie
markings:
Handwritten note in curatorial file (probably from verso of painting): 
[John Baillie of Roehampton (?) Jamaica (?)/and of Lovel Hall, Berks (?)/ Born 20 nov 1771. Died at sea in June 1832/This portrait painted by/ Sir Henry Raeburn in 18 (torn away)].
title: Portrait of John Baillie (1772-1833)
